item.title: Elden Ring Fan Designs Awesome Pins Based on Radahn and Elden Beast
item.description:
Highlights

  • Talented fan creates enamel pins of iconic Elden Ring boss fights, Elden Beast and Starscourge Radahn.
  • FromSoftware's Elden Ring continues to inspire a devoted community of fans who create unique tributes.
  • Shadow of the Erdtree DLC for Elden Ring is finally set for release on June 21, promising new content and excitement.

A talented Elden Ring fan online has shared their impressive enamel pin creations, which depict two of the game's boss fights, the Elden Beast and Starscourge Radahn. These are two of the most recognizable bosses from Elden Ring , and now they have been immortalized in a really unique way.

Since Elden Ring first launched back in 2022, the game has inspired a ton of amazing fan creations from its extremely creative community. One dedicated gamer even created a 3D animated music band based on Elden Ring , with predictably hilarious results. No other FromSoftware title has inspired such a devoted community, which creates such a wide variety of tributes to the game. Despite Elden Ring being a couple of years old now, these fan tributes are yet to slow down, and it looks as though they'll continue for many years to come yet.

Related
Elden Ring Player Discovers OP Shield Feature After 1400 Hours In The Game

An Elden Ring fan comes across an extremely useful shield mechanic which several other players seem to have missed all this while as well.

Redditor of_MiceandWomen shared their impressive enamel pins, which depict two of the toughest Elden Ring bosses - the Elden Beast and Starscourge Radahn. Although the pins use large block colors, they still manage to include a ton of detail on the duo, and it's clear who it's attempting to show. There's even a health bar along the bottom of the pins, as if it's based on the in-game boss fight itself. According to the user, they're planning on doing a whole boss series of pins, and it'll be fascinating to see who they decide to create next.

Elden Beast and Starscourge Radahn Elden Ring Pins

As the final battle in Elden Ring , the Elden Beast has quickly become one of the most iconic bosses in the game. It's the final challenge the game has to offer, after hours of excruciating fights against hundreds of other monsters. Because of its iconic status, the Elden Beast is often the center of many interesting fan creations. One gamer even recreated the Elden Beast in Spore , which is certainly a unique way to pay tribute to the boss.

FromSoftware is currently gearing up to release the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC for Elden Ring . After an extensive period of waiting, the expansion is currently set for release on June 21, promising a new story, new bosses, and new equipment to find throughout the world. It was recently confirmed that Shadow of the Erdtree will be the only DLC for Elden Ring , so hopefully it can live up to the hype and prove to be worth the wait. It's exciting to be a fan of the game right now, and with amazing creations like these enamel pins being released, it's a great time to be part of the community.

item.title: Fallout 4 Player Points Out Bizarre Preserved Pie Detail
item.description:
Highlights

  • Retrieving the perfectly preserved pie in Fallout 4 is a tedious process that can take a long time and many attempts.
  • Taking the pie after acquiring it is considered stealing in Diamond City, resulting in the player being shot to death.

A Fallout 4 player online has discovered a bizarre detail about the game's perfectly preserved pie, specifically when it's found in Diamond City. Retrieving the perfectly preserved pie in Fallout 4 is an exercise in patience, and this player was disappointed with what they found upon getting it.

Like any Bethesda game, Fallout 4 is filled with a ton of unique details that make the game a blast to explore. One recent Fallout 4 player even noticed a unique detail about Codsworth , and it's impressive that gamers are still finding new things about the title over eight years after its initial launch. Small details like this are such a large part of the game's ongoing popularity. If gamers always feel like there is still something new to discover just around the corner, they'll keep playing with repeat playthroughs, and this is very frequently the game with Bethesda titles.

Related
Fallout 3 Vs. Fallout 4: Which Game Is Better?

Fallout 3 and 4 are two of the most influential post-apocalyptic games ever made, but which rules the wastelands?

Redditor Serbian-American had finally managed to get the machine to dispense the perfectly preserved pie in Fallout 4 . This can be a drawn-out process, and in this particular case, it took 30 minutes and over 50 attempts. According to the user, the bar watched them do this the entire time without issue. However, when it came to actually taking the pie from the slot, it's counted as stealing from the bar in Fallout 4 's Diamond City . With how the game works, taking this pie would result in the player being shot to death, a bizarre punishment for a crime no one had a problem with for 30 minutes previous.

Strange Perfectly Preserved Pie Detail in Fallout 4

Gamers in the thread tried to come up with a solution that would allow the player to take the perfectly preserved pie. One player had a particularly dark solution, claiming it would no longer be a problem "if there aren't any witnesses left breathing." However, it was pointed out that the presence of essential NPCs could make this particular method more hassle than it's worth. Another common suggestion was to use a stealth boy in Fallout 4 to pick up the pie, which would allow the player to grab it undetected. Under the circumstances, this definitely seems like the way forward in this situation.

With Fallout 4 still benefiting from the popularity of the Prime Video TV adaptation, gamers are experiencing the game all over again. Bethesda recently released the next-gen update for the game, and at first, it came with a few issues. However, Fallout 4 's next-gen update 2 is a hit with fans , with Bethesda refining it to be a much smoother experience across all platforms. Even almost nine years after its release, it's great to see there's a ton of life left in Fallout 4 yet.

item.title: Fallout 4 Clip Highlights the Hilarity of Popular Mod
item.description:
Highlights

  • Fallout 4 mods offer endless fun and potential for hilarious encounters.
  • Players can expand their Fallout 4 experience with mods for vehicles, NPCs, armor, and more, enhancing gameplay possibilities.
  • The Nuclear Football mod allows players to throw Mini-Nukes like a quarterback, creating chaotic explosions in the Commonwealth.

A Fallout 4 player has shared a clip that highlights the hilarity of the Nuclear Football mod. Fallout 4 is like other Bethesda titles with its wide array of downloadable mods, but this one may result in some fun enemy encounters.

Since it was released, Fallout 4 has had an impressive mod offering that allows players to expand what's possible in their open worlds. There are mods for Fallout 4 vehicles , NPCs, armor, and Settlements, with some quality-of-life ones being practically essential. There are hundreds of mods for Bethesda fans to choose between, with the game having a plugin limit of 255. With such a high limit, some players mix and match mods, occasionally resulting in crashes and other bugs. One gamer has discovered the hilarity that can ensue when using the Nuclear Football mod available on PC and consoles.

Related
Fallout 4 Player Fights Mama Murphy and Instantly Regrets It

Mama Murphy demonstrates her hand-to-hand expertise in a hilarious Fallout 4 clip where the Sole Survivor foolishly decides to pick a fight.

Reddit user Chaddius1 recently shared a clip where they highlight the effective utilization of Fallout 4 's Nuclear Football mod. Like many other Fallout 4 mods , this one expands the arsenal that a player can defeat enemies with. This video showcases Marvel's Deadpool, the likely result of another mod, throwing a Mini-Nuke at NPC Blake Abernathy in VATS. The player executes a critical strike against the unsuspecting NPC to guarantee a hit, with VATS following the Mini-Nuke as it soars toward them. The clip concludes with much of Abernathy Farm being engulfed by the explosion, likely resulting in more than one dead NPC. True to the Marvel character it's portraying, the Fallout 4 hero strikes a pose as the Mini-Nuke explodes. With the Critical Strike and Grim Reaper's Sprint animations playing in the video, this player has likely put many points into the Luck Perk tree.

How Did This Player Accomplish Such an Impressive Throw?

The Nuclear Football mod enables players to throw the Mini-Nuke ammunition which is normally loaded into the Fallout 4 Fat Man . This makes it possible for players to roleplay as their favorite NFL quarterback in the Boston Commonwealth with a weapon that suits them. Abernathy Farm is a Settlement that players typically come across while progressing through the Minutemen campaign. As Blake Abernathy is normally a friendly NPC, this player may be taking an evil path in their modded playthrough.

As the community continues to add new mods to Fallout 4 , similarly hilarious ones may be released in the future. Bethesda's latest game, Starfield , is also being modded by the community, but the Nuclear Football hasn't made an appearance yet. As the Fallout franchise has seen a resurgence in players since the TV series was released, this mod may see some renewed attention.

item.title: Overwatch Player Spots Unusual Interaction with Busan Train
item.description:
Highlights

  • A Lucio player's unique wall-riding train maneuver on Busan is a flashy move that could catch enemies off guard in Overwatch 2.
  • Overwatch 2 continues to add classic maps like Busan, offering players new interactions and strategies to master.
  • By utilizing the wall-riding mechanic, one Lucio player was able to ride the passing train on Busan, showcasing a rare and exciting gameplay moment.

An Overwatch 2 player has spotted an unusual interaction with the Busan train after years of being a fan. The Control map Busan has been restored for Overwatch 2 from its 2018 appearance, but this clip highlights a helpful use for its train.

Before Overwatch 2 was released, the original title had 32 maps that included Assault, Escort, and Hybrid objectives. There were also 31 heroes to choose between, and the sequel features a constantly growing number, with Venture being the freshest addition. Overwatch was taken offline with the release of Overwatch 2 , initially leaving some maps out of the rotation. Blizzard continues to add classic maps to the sequel, Hanamura becoming Hanaoka in April. Among the updated maps is Busan, a location that includes an unusual train interaction that may benefit some players.

Related
Overwatch 2 Player Points Out Surprising Benefit To Playing D.Va

D.Va is a popular Overwatch 2 hero, and one player pointed out a surprising detail that makes her an even more interesting pick.

Reddit user TheRealOWFreqE recently shared a clip highlighting their experiences on the Overwatch 2 map Busan . The video begins from a Zarya's perspective as they approach the point and bubble a Lucio that seems to move erratically. It then shifts to the Lucio's point-of-view as he heals allies on the capture point while battling enemies. Avoiding an enemy Moira's Ultimate ability, the player jumps backward, making contact with a passing train at the precise time it comes through. This causes Lucio to wall-ride the train before being sent flying at the opposing team at the same speed as the locomotive.

How Did This Lucio Accomplish Their Speedy Maneuvers?

Lucio can run across walls when players hold the jump button while approaching them. This allowed Lucio to run along the train wall with split-second timing as it sped past the capture point, resulting in the Overwatch 2 Support hero moving backward and forward so rapidly. While some players may not see Busan in the standard map rotation, it's available in Custom game modes and has been upgraded for Overwatch 2 . According to TheRealOWFreqE, they had played Overwatch for eight years before ever encountering a Lucio maneuver comparable to this one. While it was a flashy maneuver, it's unclear if this Lucio movement confused the enemy team or resulted in victory for their squad.

Without the Busan train passing by as Lucio jumped towards it, this player may have simply jumped off the side of the map to their death. It's currently unclear why they were sent flying in two directions, but it seems related to the momentum of the vehicle. As Blizzard continues to update Overwatch 2 , this Lucio interaction with the train may be polished in a future patch.

item.title: NBA 2K24 Fan Makes Real Life Version of the Default Shoes
item.description:
Highlights

  • Fans are amazed by a real-life recreation of the NBA 2K24 player character's default shoes.
  • NBA 2K24 is steadily improving with updates, setting the stage for potential big changes in NBA 2K25.
  • Customization options in NBA 2K24 go beyond shoes, with the latest update injecting new content and cosmetics.

A creative NBA 2K24 fan put together an impressive real-life version of the generic basketball sneakers the player character gets in the game. It's amusing because NBA 2K24 has far superior options when it comes to basketball shoes that one can recreate in real life, so customization jobs like these are generally left to other games like Pokemon , which only have the occasional sneaker collaboration with brands such as Skechers and Puma.

NBA 2K24 is the latest entry in 2K Sports' long-running basketball game franchise. While initially released to lukewarm reactions, steady updates have made the game much better. While there's not much buzz nor controversy surrounding NBA 2K24 , all eyes are on 2K to do something big for NBA 2K25 later this year.

Related
The Next NBA 2K Cover Athlete Feels Obvious

The Minnesota Timberwolves have a rising superstar who is making a strong case to be the next NBA 2K cover athlete for NBA 2K25

Redditor Flashy_Extreme8871, who is also a fashion designer, posted their amazing take on the "2K Generic" shoe over on r/NBA2k. It's not clear if they modded an existing basketball sneaker or cobbled one together from scratch, but the result is an impressive reconstruction of the admittedly unremarkable shoe in a Jordan-esque black and red colorway. The upper is made of a black nylon mesh that has the familiar 2K logo printed on the back, accented with a buttery red ankle collar and a leather toecap. The shoe's midsole, which looks similar to Nike's ZoomX tech, looks chunky and well-padded, while the sole pattern looks like a typical basketball sneaker's, all of which suggest that this may be a modified existing silhouette with superior craftsmanship.

There's Another 2K Generic Shoe Coming Soon

Redditors in the comments made jokes about the creation while praising it at the same time. Some have referenced how players who pour their VCs into stats in NBA 2K24 would still likely be rocking the 2K Generics. Some also think the real-life shoe is just as ugly as the in-game version, while most have expressed how cool it looks when done properly. Flashy_Extreme8871 mentioned that they'll be making the gray version of the shoe next.

NBA 2K24 offers a lot of customization options for players that go beyond shoes. The latest Season 7 update for NBA 2K24 which dropped last May 17 injected a lot more content into the game, satisfying those who are always looking for something new to play for. Other than stat changes and new MyTEAM cards, numerous cosmetics have been added to the MyCAREER mode.

Meanwhile, 2K Sports has the potential to make NBA 2K25 special later this year. 2024 has seen the amazing rise of award-winning college superstar Caitlin Clark, who's swept the basketball world by storm with her heroics in this year's NCAA women's basketball tournament. Her growing fanbase suggests that heavily featuring Caitlin Clark on NBA 2K25 would be the best move to make in order to revitalize the franchise, and it's safe to assume that the company may be keeping a close eye on her career.
